entry.title: SMOG WARNING , Shawinigan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:50 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
